LanguageData.MonkeyPenis.label: monkey penis
LanguageData.MonkeyPenis.description: A small penis with a rotund head, and no sheath. Somewhat similar to a human's.
LanguageData.PigPenis.label: corkscrew penis
LanguageData.PigPenis.description: A long and thin penis. The flesh of one side of the shaft is softer then other side, causing it to have a corckscrew shape when erect. This penis in particular produces a huge amount of semen for its size.
LanguageData.BearPenis.label: bear penis
LanguageData.BearPenis.description: A thin penis supported by a bone.
LanguageData.TurtlePenis.label: turtle penis
LanguageData.TurtlePenis.description: A large penis that telescopically extends from the shaft. The flat head swells up so much that it looks like a toiled plunger when fully flared.
LanguageData.ElephantPenis.label: elephant penis
LanguageData.ElephantPenis.description: A large penis that telescopically extends from the shaft. When erect, it is very flexible and mobile, enough to lightly manipulate things.
LanguageData.BovinePenis.label: bovine penis
LanguageData.BovinePenis.description: A very long, but also very thin penis that telescopically extends from the shaft. It has very large testicles.
LanguageData.MarinePenis.label: marine penis
LanguageData.MarinePenis.description: A penis that is girthy at the base, but tapers to a very thin point.
LanguageData.HorseAnus.label: equine anus
LanguageData.HorseAnus.description: A puffy anus, its shaped like a dougnut.
LanguageData.CatAnus.label: feline anus
LanguageData.DogAnus.label: canine anus
LanguageData.CervineVagina.label: cervine vagina
LanguageData.CervineAnus.label: cervine anus
